name: True Light
description:
This world is ruled by two opposite forces. Light, and …Light.

You play as Firefly Inspector, a mysterious agent that wants to stop the war between waves and particles. Will you succeed?

  • Game engine: Godot 3.2
  • Sprites: Krita
  • Music: LMMS
  • Sound effects: from Kenney (kenney.nl), explosion from Duckstruction
  • Font: Pixel Unicode

Controls:

  • A/D, or arrow keys: move left and right
  • SPACE, or Up arrow: jump
